mapper.select: SELECT A.PLNT_CD, A.REQ_IDX, A.LOT_NO, A.SPL_LOT_NO, A.PHS_ORDER_TYP, A.PHS_ORDER_NO, A.PHS_ORDER_ITM, A.PDT_ORDER_TYP, A.PDT_ORDER_NO, A.ETR_QTY FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ A WHERE A.BATCH_NO = #{batchNo} AND (PLNT_CD, REQ_IDX) IN ( SELECT PLNT_CD, MAX(REQ_IDX) FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ WHERE BATCH_NO = #{batchNo} GROUP BY PLNT_CD )

SELECT DISTINCT A.PLNT_CD, A.REQ_IDX, A.PLNT_CD, A.ISP_REQ_NO, A.MTR_CD, QPI.PITM_NM AS MTR_NM, A.LOT_NO, A.SPL_LOT_NO, A.BATCH_NO, A.PDT_ORDER_NO, A.PDT_ORDER_TYP, A.PHS_ORDER_NO, A.PHS_ORDER_ITM, A.PHS_ORDER_TYP, A.CSM_NM, B.ANS_NO FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ A JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.REQ_IDX = B.REQ_IDX -- 자재명 가져오기 위한 JOIN LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON A.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND A.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND A.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.REQ_IDX = #{reqIdx}

SELECT DISTINCT B.MTR_CD, QPI.PITM_NM AS MTR_NM, B.PHS_ORDER_NO, B.PHS_ORDER_ITM, B.PDT_ORDER_NO, B.BATCH_NO, B.LOT_NO, Q.REQ_IDX, Q.ISP_REQ_NO, Q.SPL_LOT_NO, Q.PDT_ORDER_TYP, Q.PHS_ORDER_TYP, P.ANS_NO FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA A LEFT JOIN MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.MTR_CD = B.MTR_CD AND A.BATCH_NO = B.BATCH_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ Q ON B.PLNT_CD = Q.PLNT_CD AND B.MTR_CD = Q.MTR_CD AND B.LOT_NO = Q.LOT_NO AND B.BATCH_NO = Q.BATCH_NO AND B.PDT_ORDER_NO = Q.PDT_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC P ON Q.PLNT_CD = P.PLNT_CD AND Q.REQ_IDX = P.REQ_IDX -- 자재명 가져오기 위한 JOIN LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON Q.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND Q.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND Q.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.MTR_CD = #{mtrCd} AND A.BATCH_NO = #{batchNo}

SELECT DISTINCT B.MTR_CD, QPI.PITM_NM AS MTR_NM, B.PHS_ORDER_NO, B.PHS_ORDER_ITM, B.PDT_ORDER_NO, B.BATCH_NO, B.LOT_NO, Q.REQ_IDX, Q.ISP_REQ_NO, Q.SPL_LOT_NO, Q.PDT_ORDER_TYP, Q.PHS_ORDER_TYP, P.ANS_NO FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA A LEFT JOIN MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.MTR_CD = B.MTR_CD AND A.BATCH_NO = B.BATCH_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ Q ON B.PLNT_CD = Q.PLNT_CD AND B.MTR_CD = Q.MTR_CD AND B.LOT_NO = Q.LOT_NO AND B.BATCH_NO = Q.BATCH_NO AND B.PHS_ORDER_NO = Q.PHS_ORDER_NO AND B.PHS_ORDER_ITM = Q.PHS_ORDER_ITM LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC P ON Q.PLNT_CD = P.PLNT_CD AND Q.REQ_IDX = P.REQ_IDX -- 자재명 가져오기 위한 JOIN LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON Q.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND Q.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND Q.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.MTR_CD = #{mtrCd} AND A.BATCH_NO = #{batchNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_SHIPT (IDX, DEGREE, PLNT_CD, REQ_IDX, LOT_NO, SPL_LOT_NO, PDT_ORDER_NO, PDT_ORDER_TYP, PHS_ORDER_NO, PHS_ORDER_TYP, PHS_ORDER_ITM) VALUES (#{idx}, #{degree}, #{degree}, #{reqIdx}, #{lotNo}, #{splLotNo}, #{pdtOrderNo}, #{pdtOrderTyp}, #{phsOrderNo}, #{phsOrderTyp}, #{phsOrderItm})

SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM IF_TRS_QMS_SHIPT_TEST WHERE SHIPT_IDX = #{shiptIdx}
INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_SHIPT_TEST (SHIPT_IDX, SEQ, REQ_IDX, ISP_REQ_NO, MTR_CD, MTR_NM, BATCH_NO, CSM_NM, ANS_NO) VALUES (#{shiptIdx}, #{seq}, #{reqIdx}, #{ispReqNo}, #{mtrCd}, #{mtrNm}, #{batchNo}, #{csmNm}, #{ansNo})

SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM IF_TRS_QMS_SHIPT_PERFORM WHERE SHIPT_TEST_IDX = #{shiptTestIdx}
INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_SHIPT_PERFORM (SHIPT_TEST_IDX, SEQ, REQ_IDX, ISP_REQ_NO, MTR_CD, MTR_NM, LOT_NO, SPL_LOT_NO, BATCH_NO, PDT_ORDER_NO, PDT_ORDER_TYP, PHS_ORDER_NO, PHS_ORDER_TYP, PHS_ORDER_ITM, ANS_NO) VALUES (#{shiptTestIdx}, #{seq}, #{reqIdx}, #{ispReqNo}, #{mtrCd}, #{mtrNm}, #{lotNo}, #{splLotNo}, #{batchNo}, #{pdtOrderNo}, #{pdtOrderTyp}, #{phsOrderNo}, #{phsOrderTyp}, #{phsOrderItm}, #{ansNo})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT REQ.PLNT_CD, REQ.REQ_IDX, REQ.ISP_REQ_NO, REQ.BATCH_NO, REQ.MTR_CD, QPI.PITM_NM AS MTR_NM, REQ.CSM_NM, QPAP.ANS_NO, QPAP.ANS_TYP, QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD, QPAP.SYT_JDG AS PITM_JDG_DIV FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ REQ LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON REQ.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND REQ.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD -- 자재명 가져오기 위한 JOIN LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND REQ.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE REQ.LOT_NO = #{lotNo} AND REQ.PDT_ORDER_NO = #{pdtOrderNo} -- 취소건은 대상에서 제외 AND (REQ.ADD_COL2 IS NULL OR REQ.ADD_COL2 != #{testCancelFlag}) AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD != #{testCancelProcessCode}

SELECT DISTINCT REQ.REQ_IDX, REQ.ISP_REQ_NO, REQ.BATCH_NO, REQ.MTR_CD, QPI.PITM_NM AS MTR_NM, REQ.CSM_NM, QPAP.ANS_NO, QPAP.ANS_TYP, QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD, QPAP.SYT_JDG AS PITM_JDG_DIV FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ REQ LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON REQ.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND REQ.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD -- 자재명 가져오기 위한 JOIN LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND REQ.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE LOT_NO = #{lotNo} AND PHS_ORDER_NO = #{phsOrderNo} -- 취소건은 대상에서 제외 AND (REQ.ADD_COL2 IS NULL OR REQ.ADD_COL2 != #{testCancelFlag}) AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD != #{testCancelProcessCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_MATERIAL (IDX, DEGREE, CRT_DS, TRS_STATUS) VALUES (#{idx}, #{degree}, SYSDATE, #{trsStatus})
INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_COSMETIC (MATERIAL_IDX, IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_NM, PER_PITM_NM, PKG_UNIT, MST_FML_NO) VALUES (#{materialIdx}, #{idx}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmNm}, #{perPitmNm}, #{pkgUnit}, #{mstFmlNo})

INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_COSMETIC_BULK (MATERIAL_IDX, IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_NM, PER_PITM_NM, VDR_BP_CD, VDR_NM, PITM_DIV, TYP_DIV, TYP_DTL, CHAT_DIV, FTN_DIV, USE_LMT, OPEN_LMT, LAB_NO, FML_NO) VALUES (#{materialIdx}, #{idx}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmNm}, #{perPitmNm}, #{vdrBpCd}, #{vdrNm}, #{pitmDiv}, #{typDiv}, #{typDtl}, #{chatDiv}, #{ftnDiv}, #{useLmt}, #{openLmt}, #{labNo}, #{fmlNo})
INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_DRUG (MATERIAL_IDX, IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_NM, PER_PITM_NM, PKG_UNIT, MST_FML_NO) VALUES (#{materialIdx}, #{idx}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmNm}, #{perPitmNm}, #{pkgUnit}, #{mstFmlNo})
INSERT INTO IF_TRS_QMS_DRUG_BULK (MATERIAL_IDX, IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_NM) VALUES (#{materialIdx}, #{idx}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmNm})
